sentence: Listening to soft music is a ______ activity after a long day.
sentence_translation: 漫长的一天后，听轻音乐是一项令人放松的活动。

sentence: Students must ______ ______ ______ at the end of each term.
sentence_translation: 学生必须在每学期末参加考试。

sentence: She has built a successful ______ in the field of medicine.
sentence_translation: 她在医学领域建立了成功的职业。

sentence: He decided to ______ his job and pursue further studies.
sentence_translation: 他决定辞职去深造。

sentence: Hiking in the mountains all day is a ______ experience.
sentence_translation: 整天在山里徒步是一次累人的经历。

sentence: Preparing for the final exam can be a ______ time for students.
sentence_translation: 备考期末对学生来说可能是一段有压力的时期。

sentence: Her monthly ______ is enough to cover rent and daily expenses.
sentence_translation: 她的月薪足够支付房租和日常开销。

chinese: 顾问；辅导员；心理咨询师
sentence: The school ______ helps students deal with academic pressure.
sentence_translation: 学校辅导员帮助学生应对学业压力。

sentence: He is ______ about teaching and always inspires his students.
sentence_translation: 他对教学充满热情，总是激励他的学生。

sentence: The ______ provides training opportunities for all new employees.
sentence_translation: 雇主为所有新员工提供培训机会。

sentence: Many people ______ clothes and food to those in need.
sentence_translation: 许多人向有需要的人捐赠衣物和食物。

sentence: The ______ raises money to help homeless children.
sentence_translation: 这个慈善机构筹集资金帮助无家可归的儿童。

sentence: They ______ a family-owned restaurant in the downtown area.
sentence_translation: 他们在市中心经营一家家族餐馆。

sentence: It is our ______ to keep the environment clean.
sentence_translation: 保持环境清洁是我们的责任。

sentence: She can ______ her work and family life perfectly.
sentence_translation: 她能完美地管理工作和家庭生活。

sentence: He ______ ______ a leading technology company as a designer.
sentence_translation: 他为一家领先的科技公司做设计师。

sentence: The team is ______ ______ a new project to improve energy efficiency.
sentence_translation: 这个团队正在从事一个提高能源效率的新项目。

sentence: She ______ ______ a strict but supportive manager.
sentence_translation: 她在一位严格但支持下属的经理手下工作。

sentence: He is ______ ______ ______ the marketing department of the company.
sentence_translation: 他负责公司的市场部门。

sentence: Hard work and persistence help you ______ ______ in your career.
sentence_translation: 努力工作和坚持不懈能帮助你在事业上取得成功。

sentence: His uncle owns an ______ ______ ______ that trades with Asian countries.
sentence_translation: 他叔叔拥有一家与亚洲国家做贸易的进出口公司。

sentence: She plans to ______ ______ computer science when she goes to college.
sentence_translation: 她上大学时打算主修计算机科学。

sentence: Many students ______ ______ ______ the summer camp to improve their English.
sentence_translation: 许多学生报名参加夏令营来提高英语水平。

sentence: New students need to take a ______ ______ to determine their language level.
sentence_translation: 新生需要参加分班测试来确定他们的语言水平。

sentence: We will ______ ______ ______ on environmental protection this Friday.
sentence_translation: 我们这周五将去听一场关于环境保护的讲座。

chinese: 享受派对；参加派对很开心
sentence: They ______ ______ ______ with their friends on New Year's Eve.
sentence_translation: 除夕夜他们和朋友们开心地参加派对。

sentence: The group will ______ ______ ______ of the ancient castle next week.
sentence_translation: 这个团体下周将去参观那座古堡。

sentence: The school band will ______ ______ ______ at the opening ceremony.
sentence_translation: 学校乐队将在开幕式上表演。

sentence: The department heads ______ ______ ______ every Wednesday afternoon.
sentence_translation: 部门主管们每周三下午开会。

sentence: Applicants must ______ ______ ______ before being admitted to the program.
sentence_translation: 申请者在被该项目录取前必须参加测试。
